variants.medium_60: Sesame. Jaggery. Nostalgia. ‚Äî The GUD Bites you grew up with.
variants.long_120: Handcrafted Til-Gud bites that bring back childhood memories ‚Äî made with pure jaggery, toasted sesame, and zero guilt.

hero_copy.full_paragraph: Remember those golden winter evenings when Nani would slip you a piece of til-gud? That crunch, that warmth, that feeling of home? We've bottled it. MitthuuG brings you artisan GUD Bites ‚Äî handcrafted in small batches with pure jaggery, premium sesame, and a whole lot of pyaar. No refined sugar. No preservatives. Just the nostalgia you crave and the energy you need. From our Mitthu Express kitchen to your chai-time ritual ‚Äî welcome aboard!
hero_copy.subheadline: Artisan Til-Gud Bites | Handcrafted Daily | Station-to-Snack Freshness

products.title: Classic Til-Gud Bites
products.short_desc: Crispy sesame & jaggery bites made for everyday snacking.
products.long_desc: Our signature Til-Gud Bites combine earthy sesame seeds with pure jaggery, delivering warmth, crunch, and nostalgia in every bite. Roasted to perfection at our Mitthu Express Station 3 kitchen, these golden beauties are your go-to winter energy snack. Perfect with chai, perfect as a midday pick-me-up, perfect for sharing (but we won't judge if you don't). No refined sugar, no preservatives ‚Äî just the GUD stuff your Nani would approve of.
bullets: Rich in iron, calcium & natural energy
Stays fresh for 6 months in airtight pack
products.ingredients: Sesame seeds (49%), Jaggery (49%), Cardamom, Pure Ghee
products.alt_text: Classic Til-Gud Bites ‚Äì Golden sesame jaggery snack by MitthuuG in artisan packaging
products.meta_title: Classic Til Gud Bites | Pure Jaggery Sesame Snack - MitthuuG
products.meta_description: Handcrafted Til Gud Bites with sesame & pure jaggery. No refined sugar. Traditional taste, modern freshness. Order India's favorite winter snack.

products.title: Cardamom Til-Gud Bites
products.short_desc: Aromatic cardamom meets sesame gold ‚Äî a premium twist on tradition.
products.long_desc: For those who like their nostalgia with a hint of royal. Our Cardamom Til-Gud Bites layer premium green cardamom into the classic sesame-jaggery base, creating a fragrant, warming snack that's perfect for gifting or indulging. Each bite releases a burst of elaichi aroma that pairs beautifully with masala chai or evening coffee. Made at Mitthu Express Station 3 with hand-selected spices and small-batch care. This isn't just a snack ‚Äî it's an experience.
bullets: Perfect pairing with chai or coffee
products.ingredients: Sesame seeds (47%), Jaggery (47%), Green Cardamom (4%), Pure Ghee, Rose Water
products.alt_text: Cardamom Til-Gud Bites ‚Äì Premium aromatic sesame jaggery snack with green cardamom
products.meta_title: Cardamom Til Gud | Aromatic Sesame Snack - MitthuuG
products.meta_description: Premium Cardamom Til Gud Bites ‚Äî handcrafted with green elaichi & pure jaggery. Perfect gift for festivals. Order artisan Indian sweets online.

products.title: Almond Til-Gud Bites
products.short_desc: Crunchy almonds meet sesame crunch ‚Äî protein-packed indulgence.
products.long_desc: Upgrade your snack game with our Almond Til-Gud Bites ‚Äî a protein-rich fusion of toasted sesame, pure jaggery, and premium California almonds. Every bite delivers double crunch, double nutrition, and double the reason to feel good about snacking. Ideal for fitness enthusiasts, busy professionals, or anyone who wants their nostalgia with a nutty twist. Handcrafted at Mitthu Express with the same love as Nani's kitchen, but with a modern nutritional edge.
products.ingredients: Sesame seeds (40%), Jaggery (40%), Almonds (18%), Cardamom, Pure Ghee
products.alt_text: Almond Til-Gud Bites ‚Äì Protein-rich sesame jaggery snack with premium almonds
products.meta_title: Almond Til Gud | Protein Sesame Snack - MitthuuG
products.meta_description: Almond Til Gud Bites with premium nuts & pure jaggery. High protein, zero refined sugar. Healthy Indian snack for fitness & energy.

products.title: MitthuuG Trial Pack
products.short_desc: New to GUD Bites? Start here ‚Äî 50g of pure nostalgia.
products.long_desc: Not sure which flavor to commit to? We get it. Our Trial Pack gives you 50g of our Classic Til-Gud Bites at a special introductory price ‚Äî just enough to fall in love without the commitment. Think of it as your first stop on the Mitthu Express journey. One taste and you'll understand why thousands of snack lovers have already hopped aboard. Perfect for first-timers, gifting sampler sets, or stashing in your bag for emergencies (we won't tell).
bullets: Ideal for travel or desk snacking

products.title: MitthuuG Premium Gift Box
products.short_desc: Share GUD vibes ‚Äî 500g of artisan bites in premium packaging.
products.long_desc: The perfect gift speaks without words. Our Premium Gift Box delivers 500g of handcrafted Til-Gud goodness in elegant, festival-ready packaging that honors tradition while looking utterly Instagram-worthy. Choose from Classic, Cardamom, or Almond varieties, or mix all three. Ideal for Diwali, Makar Sankranti, corporate gifting, or showing someone you care (the delicious way). Each box comes with a handwritten note option and our signature Mitthu Express journey card. Because some gifts are worth savoring.
bullets: Choice of single or mixed flavors
Perfect for Diwali, Sankranti & corporate gifts

welcome.body:
Namaste!

Welcome aboard the Mitthu Express! üöÇ

We're thrilled you've joined thousands of snack lovers who've rediscovered the magic of traditional Til-Gud ‚Äî now made fresh, modern, and guilt-free.

Here's a little welcome gift to get you started:

**Use code FIRST10 for 10% off your first order**

Whether you're craving nostalgia or looking for a natural energy boost, our handcrafted GUD Bites deliver both. Made with pure jaggery, toasted sesame, and zero refined sugar ‚Äî just like Nani used to make, but better.

Not sure where to start? Try our Trial Pack (‚Çπ99) or dive straight into a 100g box.

Questions? Hit reply ‚Äî we read every email.

Happy snacking,
Team MitthuuG

P.S. Follow our Mitthu Express journey on Instagram @mitthuug for behind-the-scenes kitchen stories!

1. We pack your order with care
2. You'll get a tracking link via SMS/email
3. Your bites arrive fresh in 3-5 days

While you wait, here's what our community is saying:

"MitthuuG brought back my childhood winters ‚Äî one bite at a time!" - Priya, Mumbai

**First-time customer?** We'd love to hear what you think! Reply to this email or tag us on Instagram @mitthuug.

**Pro tip:** Store your bites in an airtight container for maximum freshness (they'll stay perfect for 6 months).

Thank you for choosing MitthuuG ‚Äî we can't wait for you to taste the nostalgia.

With GUD vibes,
Team MitthuuG

faq.question: Is MitthuuG sugar-free?
faq.answer: We use only natural jaggery (gud) as our sweetener ‚Äî absolutely no refined white sugar. Jaggery is a healthier alternative with minerals like iron and magnesium, and it has a lower glycemic index than refined sugar.

faq.question: How long do GUD Bites stay fresh?
faq.answer: Our GUD Bites stay fresh for up to 6 months when stored in an airtight container in a cool, dry place. We handcraft every batch to order, so you always receive the freshest product.

faq.question: Are your products suitable for vegans?
faq.answer: Our Classic and Cardamom variants contain ghee (clarified butter), so they're vegetarian but not vegan. We're working on a vegan version ‚Äî stay tuned!

faq.question: Do you ship pan-India?
faq.answer: Yes! We ship across India via trusted courier partners. Orders are typically delivered within 3-5 business days. Free shipping on orders above ‚Çπ499.

faq.question: What makes MitthuuG different from regular til-gud?
faq.answer: We combine traditional recipes with modern hygiene standards and premium ingredients. Every batch is handcrafted in small quantities, quality-tested, and packed fresh. Plus, our packaging is Instagram-worthy and gift-ready!

faq.question: Can I customize a gift box?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our Premium Gift Box allows you to choose a single flavor or mix all three. You can also add a personalized handwritten note during checkout.

faq.question: Are there any allergens in your products?
faq.answer: Our products contain sesame seeds and may contain traces of nuts (especially the Almond variant). We also use ghee (dairy). Please check individual product pages for detailed ingredient lists.

faq.question: What is the Mitthu Express?
faq.answer: Mitthu Express is our journey ‚Äî from recipe testing to kitchen setup to your doorstep. We share behind-the-scenes stories on Instagram, making you part of our growth. Every 'Station' represents a milestone!

faq.question: Do you offer bulk orders for corporate gifting?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer special pricing and customization for corporate orders above 25 boxes. Email us at hello@mitthuug.com or WhatsApp +91-XXXXXXXXXX for details.

faq.question: Can I return or exchange my order?
faq.answer: Due to the handcrafted food nature of our products, we don't accept returns on opened packages. However, if you receive a damaged or incorrect order, contact us within 24 hours for a replacement or refund.

faq.question: Are your products made in a certified kitchen?
faq.answer: Yes! Our Mitthu Express kitchen is FSSAI-certified and follows strict hygiene protocols. Every batch is made in a clean, controlled environment.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept UPI, debit/credit cards, net banking, and cash on delivery (COD) for orders below ‚Çπ2,000. All payments are processed securely.

faq.question: Do you have a subscription service?
faq.answer: Not yet, but it's coming soon! Join our newsletter to be the first to know when we launch monthly subscription boxes.

faq.question: Where do you source your ingredients?
faq.answer: We source premium sesame from Gujarat, organic jaggery from Maharashtra, and California almonds for our Almond variant. Quality is non-negotiable at MitthuuG.

faq.question: Can I track my order?
faq.answer: Yes! Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking link via SMS and email. You can also track from your account dashboard on our website.

design_brief.hero_image_concept: Close-up of golden Til-Gud bites arranged on a textured ivory linen cloth, with a vintage brass bowl partially visible. Soft, diffused natural daylight from the side creates warm shadows. A few loose sesame seeds scattered artfully. Background blurred to emphasize product texture. Shot from a 45-degree angle. Color palette: ochre gold, chocolate brown, ivory cream.
design_brief.photography_style: Natural light, rustic-modern, product-focused with cultural context (brass bowls, handwoven textiles, terracotta). Avoid overly polished studio shots ‚Äî aim for 'artisan kitchen' authenticity.
design_brief.packaging_design_notes: Premium matte finish box in ivory with ochre gold logo. Minimalist front with product window. Inside lid: handwritten Mitthu Express journey note. Eco-friendly, reusable materials. Gift-ready without extra wrapping.
design_brief.icon_style: Hand-drawn line icons in ochre gold. Examples: sesame seed cluster, jaggery block, mortar & pestle, train (Mitthu Express), leaf (natural), chef hat (handcrafted).

typography_usage.headings: Playfair Display ‚Äî elegant, nostalgic serif for brand name and hero headlines
typography_usage.subheadings: Merriweather ‚Äî readable serif for section titles
typography_usage.body: Inter or Lato ‚Äî clean sans-serif for product descriptions and UI
typography_usage.accent: Handwritten script font for 'Mitthu Express' journey elements (use sparingly)
